trans-unit.source: A file system can set RemovalPolicy. Default policy is RETAIN.
trans-unit.target: 文件系统可以设置 RemovalPolicy 。默认策略是 RETAIN 。

trans-unit.source: All classes with the Cfn prefix in this module (CFN Resources) are always stable and safe to use.
trans-unit.target: 此模块中所有带有 Cfn 前缀的类（CFN资源）始终稳定且可以安全使用。

trans-unit.source: Amazon Elastic File System Construct Library
trans-unit.target: 亚马逊弹性文件系统构造库

trans-unit.source: An access point is an application-specific view into an EFS file system that applies an operating system user and group, and a file system path, to any file system request made through the access point. The operating system user and group override any identity information provided by the NFS client. The file system path is exposed as the access point's root directory. Applications using the access point can only access data in its own directory and below. To learn more, see Mounting a File System Using EFS Access Points.
trans-unit.target: 访问点是EFS文件系统的特定于应用程序的视图，该文件将操作系统用户和组以及文件系统路径应用于通过该访问点发出的任何文件系统请求。操作系统用户和组将覆盖NFS客户端提供的任何身份信息。文件系统路径作为访问点的根目录公开。使用访问点的应用程序只能访问其自己的目录及以下目录中的数据。要了解更多信息，请参阅使用EFS访问点挂载文件系统。

trans-unit.source: By default, when you create an access point, the root(/) directory is exposed to the client connecting to the access point. You may specify custom path with the path property. If path does not exist, it will be created with the settings defined in the creationInfo. See Creating Access Points for more details.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，创建访问点时，根目录（ / ）向连接到访问点的客户端公开。您可以使用 path 属性指定自定义路径。如果 path 不存在，将使用 creationInfo 中定义的设置来创建它。有关更多详细信息，请参见 创建访问点。

trans-unit.source: In order to automatically mount this file system during instance launch, following code can be used as reference:
trans-unit.target: 为了在实例启动时自动挂载该文件系统,可以参考以下代码。

trans-unit.source: Mounting the file system using User Data
trans-unit.target: 使用用户数据安装文件系统

trans-unit.source: The APIs of higher level constructs in this module are experimental and under active development. They are subject to non-backward compatible changes or removal in any future version. These are not subject to the Semantic Versioning model and breaking changes will be announced in the release notes. This means that while you may use them, you may need to update your source code when upgrading to a newer version of this package.
trans-unit.target: 此模块中较高级别构造的API是实验性的，并且正在积极开发中。它们可能会在将来的任何版本中发生向后兼容的更改或删除。这些不受语义版本控制模型的限制，重大更改将在发行说明中宣布。这意味着尽管可以使用它们，但在升级到此程序包的较新版本时，可能需要更新源代码。

trans-unit.source: The CDK Construct Library for AWS::EFS
This construct library allows you to set up AWS Elastic File System (EFS).
trans-unit.target: 这个构造库允许你设置AWS弹性文件系统(EFS)。

trans-unit.source: This module is part of the AWS Cloud Development Kit project.
trans-unit.target: 该模块是AWS Cloud Development Kit项目的一部分。

trans-unit.source: To control who can access the EFS, use the .connections attribute. EFS has a fixed default port, so you don't need to specify the port:
trans-unit.target: 若要控制谁可以访问EFS，请使用 .connections 属性。EFS具有固定的默认端口，因此您无需指定端口：

trans-unit.source: Use addAccessPoint to create an access point from a fileSystem:
trans-unit.target: 使用 addAccessPoint 从文件系统创建访问点：
